work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يا ايّها الغافل ان کنت فی ريب ممّا نحن عليه انّا نشهد بما شهد اللّه قبل خلق السّموات و الارض انّه لا اله الّا هو العزيز الوهّاب و نشهد انّه کان واحدا فی ذاته و واحدا فی صفاته لم يکن له شبه فی الابداع و لا شريک فی الاختراع قد ارسل الرّسل و انزل الکتب ليبشّروا الخلق الی سواء الصّراط *
translation: "O thou who art gone astray! If thou hast any doubt concerning Our conduct, know thou that We bear witness unto that whereunto God hath Himself borne witness ere the creation of the heavens and of the earth, that there is none other God but Him, the Almighty, the All-Bounteous. We testify that He is One in His Essence, One in His Attributes. He hath none to equal Him in the whole universe, nor any partner in all creation. He hath sent forth His Messengers, and sent down His Books, that they may announce unto His creatures the Straight Path.
